```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)
library(scales)
```


Our first plot with the `diamonds` dataset


```{r}
diamonds |>
    filter(clarity =="IF") |>
ggplot() +
    geom_point(aes(x=x, y=price, size=y, color=cut), alpha = 0.7) +
    xlab("Length in mm") +
    ylab("Price") + 
    scale_y_continuous(labels = scales::dollar_format()) +
    scale_size(name = "Width in mm") +
    scale_color_brewer(name = "Cut", palette = "Accent") +
    theme_classic()
```
